title: Essence
description: "Standard vampire romance, right? The vampire falls for the human, the human falls for the vampire, and then she becomes a vampire and they live happily ever after. Isn't how this goes? That's how it always goes."Nope.Not even close.Essence is book three in the Nectar trilogy, a dark paranormal romance. Reading these books in order is essential. This is a dark paranormal romance and contains scenes and triggers that may be disturbing.
author: D.D. Prince
